content:
Stanford Court San Francisco is proud to be a pet friendly boutique hotel. Four legged family members are always welcome. Our Nob Hill neighborhood — along with nearby Huntington Park — are great for walks and meeting some of SF’s sweetest fur babies. A $50 pet and deep cleaning fee includes:

- Take home doggie bag filled with chew toys, a lint roller, waste sacks, and other treats

- Food and water bowls and a plush dog bed for use during your stay
